ple are affected by mucopolysaccharidosis type III ?,"MPS III is the most common type of mucopolysaccharidosis; the estimated incidence of all four types combined is 1 in 70,000 newborns. MPS IIIA and MPS IIIB are much more common than MPS IIIC and MPS IIID.",GHR,mucopolysaccharidosis type III
What are the genetic changes related to mucopolysaccharidosis type III ?,"Mutations in the GNS, HGSNAT, NAGLU, and SGSH genes cause MPS III. These genes provide instructions for making enzymes involved in
